item.description:
I want to invite you all to this 6 week series of classes. Please read below for details...
In Light,
Rev Gabrielle


Introduction to Christian Mysticism and Meditation
A 6 week Series
Sundays 12:00pm - 2pm
Mondays 7:30pm - 9:00pm
FREE

Mysticism refers to the practice of knowing the reality of God through direct experience. This powerful class series is designed to move you far deeper in your ability to meditate and experience the blessings and graces of the transformative path of Christian Mysticism. There will be classes on the topics of: The Inner Spiritual Path, Soul, Light, Prayer, Meditation and Blessing. There will also be time spent teaching the principles of meditation that will allow you to drop deep within your being, deeper than the body, beyond thinking and emotions, and into the territory of the Soul and God within. This is a free class series. Pre- registration required.
item.name: Introduction to Christian Mysticism and Meditation
